DOC.brief_summary: Prospective control pilot study compare outcome ProKera® ( PK ) conventional treatment patient moderate severe Dry Eye Disease ( DED )
DOC.brief_title: In Vivo Confocal Microscopic Analysis Corneal Nerve Changes After ProKera Slim® Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Subjects moderate severe DED ( Grade 24 DEWS ) Age range : 21 year old . Both gender ethnic group comparable local community . Subjects able understand willing sign write informed consent . Subjects able willing cooperate investigational plan . Subjects able willing complete postoperative followup . Symblepharon lid abnormality prevent ProKera placement . Ocular infection within 14 day prior study entry . Active ocular allergy . Previous ocular surgery injury within 3 month enrollment . Previous brain surgery , Trigeminal nerve damage . Other condition may affect corneal nerve diabetes , thyroid disorder . Contact lens wearer . Pregnancy subject expect pregnant . Inability unwillingness subject give write informed consent . Subjects know intolerance PK . Subjects use concomitant therapy affect tear function ocular surface integrity . Subjects currently engage another clinical trial .
